server_info_crawled.name: Webex Messaging Server
server_info_crawled.overview: Enable AI assistants to fully interact with Cisco Webex messaging by sending messages, managing rooms, teams, users, webhooks, and enterprise features. Access a comprehensive set of 52 tools covering all major messaging operations with secure, production-ready deployment options including Docker and dual transport modes. Simplify collaboration automation and integration with centralized configuration and enterprise authentication support.
